title: On-Call Practices
summary: Sustainable on-call practices that balance reliability with engineer well-being

concepts: Alert fatigue: Too many non-actionable alerts
Compensation: Time off, pay for on-call burden
patterns: Maximum 1 week on-call at a time
Track pages per shift, aim to reduce

examples.escalation_policy: Primary: 5 min -> Secondary: 10 min -> Manager: 30 min
examples.handoff_template: Open incidents, recent changes, known issues, maintenance windows
examples.compensation: Flat rate per shift + per-page bonus OR comp time
